title: Advanced Doors System
description: Advanced Doors System! Customizable doors with diverse opening modes, unique key systems, automation, and immersive sound settings. Perfect for game developers seeking versatility and control.
longDescription:

AdvancedDoorsSystem

Introducing the AdvancedDoorsSystem - the comprehensive, customizable door system blueprint you've been searching for! This power-packed tool provides an array of opening types, keys, widgets, automation options, sound settings, and door types, all designed to make your game development process smoother and more efficient.




Opening Type

With the AdvancedDoorsSystem, you can create doors that open on overlap, interaction, by force, or by switch - the choice is yours! You also have full control over door opening animation length, allowing you to set the perfect pace for your game environment.




Keys

Our unique Key system gives you the ability to set a key number, decide if a key is required, and choose whether to remove or keep the key post-usage. Plus, the unlock-before-opening feature adds an extra layer of interactivity and realism.




Player Feedback

The AdvancedDoorsSystem also comes with a widget display feature that shows on-screen or on the door's handle, enhancing user experience and adding to the immersive atmosphere of your game.




Automation

Automate door operations with our auto-close feature, complete with customizable delay settings. Plus, bring your doors to life with our Sound Settings options, letting you assign distinct sounds to the door opening, opening failure, and unlocking.




Door Types

Choose from standard doors, gates, and bridges, each designed to be versatile and visually stunning. Create the perfect entrance or barrier in your game with the AdvancedDoorsSystem!


-----


Get the AdvancedDoorsSystem today and unlock a new level of realism and interactivity in your game development!


-----

technicalDetails:
Features:

  1. Multiple Opening Types: Doors can be configured to open on overlap, interaction, by force, or by switch.
  2. Customizable Door Opening Animation Length: Control the pace of your game environment by adjusting the speed at which doors open.
  3. Unique Key System: Assign key numbers, decide if a key is needed for opening, and choose whether to remove or keep the key after use.
  4. Unlock-Before-Opening Feature: Adds an extra layer of interactivity and realism.
  5. Widget Display: Displays on-screen or on the door's handle for enhanced user experience.
  6. Automation Options: Doors can be set to auto-close with customizable delay settings.
  7. Sound Settings: Assign distinct sounds to the door opening, opening failure, and unlocking.
  8. Variety of Door Types: Includes standard doors, gates, and bridges, each designed to be versatile and visually appealing.

Number of Blueprints: 7 (Most important: BP_Door, AC_Doors, AC_Keys)

Input: Keyboard supported in example ("E" key for interaction, "1" key for printing the available Keys, "2" key for removing Key ID: 1), configured in BP_Character, only for presentation purposes.

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
